title: I am
creator_credit: Wombat Productions, Inc. and Gene Feldman
brief_description: Deals with the quest of a boy, entering adolescence, to discover who he is, what makes a person important, and how one gets to be somebody. Emphasises the importance of introspection, fantasy, and attempts at forming meaningful relationships in the development of the individual identity.
